content.overview: The office is, very often, the first visible part of your company. There you can make your commitment towards sustainability visible to your team & colleagues, as well as to your visitors. A category easy to start with, with quick-wins to embark further your teams on your sustainability journey.

solutions.title: Measure & Monitor
solutions.description: Measuring your office carbon footprint is a key step for a greener office. It is of high importance for an efficient environmental management: if you don't measure it, you can't manage it! It requires methodology and proper data collection: papers expenses, electronic equipments, electricity charges, office supplies. Implement an adequate procedure to measure across all departments. Set annually reduction targets to continuously improve.

solutions.title: Set up a Sustainable Procurement Policy - BASIC
solutions.description: Although some sustainable products may still be more expensive than non-sustainable ones, this 'extra cost' will be offset in the long run by better procurement practices. Steps include: 1- Analyse your current consumption and existing practices 2- Define Targets and KPI evolution 3- Prefer recyclable materials, biodegradable materials, refillable materials, certified products 4- Make it simpler by limiting orders and suppliers 5- Involve all stakeholders in the sustainable purchasing policy and train them.
